title: Early Jungle Pathing
body:
Whats yours?

The most common i've seen is Frog (smite) - Blue (no smite) - Red (smite) - Gank

replies.body: Buff (red preferably), level 2 dragon with pantheon & aegis abuse, gank.

first gromp is worth 300 xp, so its insta lvl 2. start gromp then blue.

krugs works the same. i think its every camp, whichever is first, is worth 300 xp or something?

use smite on krugs or gromp, since their smite bonus is the best of all for first clear. esp krugs on hit stun.
mid/late wraiths is the best smite objective. warns for wards and gives vision of wards.
Blue, Wolves, Red and then gank.

i just did blue -wolves- red- wraith  one go but had to b after that, as {{champion:254}}. i find it hard to be able to gank early unless you have strong sustain in your kit but alll i can do is hope lanes don't feed and gank them when i get my first machete upgrade

Had a Rengar start "normal" way, doing blue smiting it. Did the Razorbeaks and had to back before doing Red.

Seems like you need either a big fat leash or start a smaller camp first.
probs start frog on blue side

Yeah so far I am loving the Gromp smite buff so I start my path there.
Early jungle is a bit tough right now, camps are going to need some health or damage nerfs here and there to make those first few clears a bit easier.

But yeah you want to start your path on either Gromp or Krugs, their on smite bonuses are amazing and help clearing other camps so much easier.
